subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Since they clinched their division eight days ago, the Mets played in a lackluster fashion and were caught in an awkward spot, trying to rest their veterans and clinch home-field advantage simultaneously.
snippet: Since they clinched their division eight days ago, the Mets played in a lackluster fashion and were caught in an awkward spot, trying to rest their veterans and clinch home-field advantage simultaneously.
